talk1129:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Humming_01>♪Hm hm hmmm!♪ Good work is
so invigorating!
talk1130:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Link! Thank you so much for your
assistance at the reservoir!

That stone was absolutely ideal for
repairing the park!

I intend to try my best at making it look
even more beautiful than it did before the
Upheaval came to pass.
talk1131:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble_00>Well, then. When I was cleaning the
throne room, the children shooed
me away.
They declared that they were playing a
secret game and insisted, vehemently,
that adults are "not allowed."
I did hear something interesting about
their little game though...

<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>They're allegedly pretending to be
<clr:0000>King Dorephan<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> What's more, it seems
they're recreating <clr:0000>recent events<clr:ffff>.
It is ill-advised to allow them to mess
around over there. As an adult, I must
participate! I mean, watch over them!
<sp:3:0:2:0501>The question is, how do I sneak a
peek?<sp:5:0:0> I wonder if there's somewhere
I could hide...
talk1132:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>The children are playing a secret game
in the <clr:0000>throne room <clr:ffff>in which they pretend
to be <clr:0000>King Dorephan<clr:ffff>.
I'm overcome with curiosity! They're
allegedly recreating <clr:0000>recent events <clr:ffff>with
this game.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>The question is, how do I sneak a
peek?<sp:5:0:0> I wonder if there's somewhere
I could hide...
talk1116:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Hm?!<sp:5:0:0> Have you suffered damage from the
sludge, friend?!<sp:5:0:0> Are your gills well?!

I am in the midst of a battle, so I cannot
accompany you, but please pay a visit to
the infirmary if need be!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>With this mop as my weapon, <sp:5:0:0>I must
resume the fight! <sp:5:1:0>It is me against this
dreaded muck!
In other words... I must keep this place
clean, otherwise it will hinder our ability
to bring in more patients.
<sp:3:0:2:0400><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Ah. Upon closer inspection, it's you. A Hylian.
Without a gill to your name!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk1133:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_00>In the end I was unable to glimpse the
game that the children were playing.

It is a shame, but I really must return to
my duty.
talk1134: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Wakeup_00>Phew! I did some great work today.
talk1135:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Wakeup_00>*yaaawn*<sp:5:0:0> I think I have earned a bit of
slacking off...<sp:5:0:0>just for a short while,
of course.
talk1136:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Zo! Zo! Zo!<sp:5:1:0> That is the sound of
Zora zeal!
talk1137:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>When sludge gets in a Zora's gills, their
health fails fast.

That is why the infirmary has been set
up—to give victims of that gunk a safe
place to rest.
<sp:3:0:2:0901>It is also why I must continue fighting this
accursed sludge, day in and day out.
The domain must be kept clean!
talk1138:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>Hello! How are things? Do you need
anything from our fair Zora's Domain?
talk1139:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Could it be<sp:5:0:0> that you somehow managed to
hear what the young ones were saying<sp:5:0:0>
about King Dorephan?
Please, tell me! What did they say?!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Ah... I have gotten carried away.<sp:5:0:0> I'll just
have to find a way to hear their chatter
for myself!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:TalkPositive_00>I am speaking of the filthy sludge and the
sullied water that it has melted into.

The sludge started falling on the day of
the Upheaval.

When the sludge touches the water,
that sweet, life-giving liquid becomes
instantly sullied.
I am sure this fact is blatantly obvious
when strolling the domain, <sp:5:0:0>but the water
that is that awful color is the dirty water.
<snd:Ease_00>As Zora, our existence is irrevocably
entwined with the water. It's our lifeblood.
We cannot live without clean water.
talk1122:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Understand>Now then... <sp:5:0:0>I really must return
to cleaning!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>If I leave any trace of sludge, it will dirty
the water that Prince Sidon has so
valiantly cleaned for us.<sp:5:0:0> *sigh*
talk1123:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>Ah, greetings! <sp:5:1:0>Did you come to see
Prince Sidon?
talk1140:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Could it be<sp:5:0:0> that you somehow managed to
hear what the young ones were saying<sp:5:0:0>
about King Dorephan?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I am terribly fascinated by how the young
ones are pretending to be King Dorephan.

I was just pondering if there's some way
I could sneak closer to overhear their
chatter!
Please, tell me! What are they saying?


<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Ah... I have gotten carried away.<sp:5:0:0> I'll just
have to find a way to hear their chatter
for myself!
talk1106:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Humming_00>♪Hm hm hmm! I'm light on my fins!
My future's full of wins!♪
talk1124:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you're looking for Prince Sidon, he can
be found at <clr:0000>Mipha Court<clr:ffff>.

And that place can be found at Ploymus
Mountain. It has such an exquisite view,
I've considered not telling others about it.
Although...I suppose I just did. Hm.
talk1141:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>What are they saying...


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>My fascination has grown stronger still!
I must find a way to hear their chatter
for myself.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:TalkPositive_01>Now I will resume my thorough
cleaning so that the domain's waters
are not muddied!
Not even a speck of sludge will be spared
my cleaning wrath!
talk1125:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>My duty is to repair the domain, but I
have not touched the tools necessary
for that in days.
The building damage concerns me greatly,
true, but my most important task at
present is to fight the sludge's mess!
I am...<sp:5:0:0>quite motivated.
talk1127:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Admiration_01>If you are searching for Prince Sidon,
you will find him at <clr:0000>Mipha Court<clr:ffff>.

And that place can be found at Ploymus
Mountain. It has such an exquisite view,
I've considered not telling others about it.
Although...I suppose I just did. Hm.
talk1128:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Understand_00>I feel incredibly motivated to maintain
Mipha Court.

I am so very thankful to King Sidon for
entrusting this work to me!
